Perfect! Now I can see the `_is_ignored_file` function. It checks:
1. `basename in ignore_list` - checks if the basename is in the ignore list
2. `_is_in_ignore_list_re(basename, ignore_list_re)` - checks basename against regex patterns
3. `_is_in_ignore_list_re(element, ignore_list_paths_re)` - checks full path against ignore_paths regex patterns
